trans-unit.source: Represents the configuration section for scripting settings.
trans-unit.target: Representa a secção de configuração para as definições de script.
Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Use the ScriptingSectionGroup class to programmatically set and retrieve the values of the `scripting` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar a classe de ScriptingSectionGroup para definir e obter os valores de programaticamente o `scripting` secção do ficheiro de configuração.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingSectionGroup"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingSectionGroup"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection"></xref> object that is derived from the current system configuration.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection"> </xref> objeto que é derivado da configuração do sistema atual.

trans-unit.source: Use the `ScriptingScriptResourceHandler` configuration section to set whether script files that are embedded as resources are compressed and cached.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o `ScriptingScriptResourceHandler` secção de configuração para definir se os ficheiros de script que estão incorporados como recursos são comprimidos e colocadas em cache.

trans-unit.source: You can enable or disable compression and caching by using the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection.EnableCompression%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection.EnableCaching%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Pode ativar ou desativar a compressão e a colocação em cache utilizando o <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection.EnableCompression%2A>e <xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection.EnableCaching%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection.EnableCaching%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingScriptResourceHandlerSection.EnableCompression%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingWebServicesSectionGroup"></xref> object that is derived from the current system configuration.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.ScriptingWebServicesSectionGroup"> </xref> objeto que é derivado da configuração do sistema atual.
